data.text: @TimSheehyMT So why is Trump demanding voter personal data and has said he will federalize the elections?
@TimSheehyMT Sheehy = Bigot, Racist, White Supremacist, Disgrace to the US Navy.  Corrupt and seditious.

@TimSheehyMT It passed the House and is sitting in the Senate. Republicans control the Senate. You post garbage daily blaming the Democrats for Republican inefficiencies and it’s lame AF. Do your job.
@ron_drouin @TimSheehyMT Or y'all can just leave those of us that live in a state with voter ID laws alone.

@TimSheehyMT Who gives a shit anymore. All politicians are trash. Left and right! You all protect chomos, give taxpayer money to foreign governments, fight Israel’s wars, or don’t give a shit about our people here in America. Just yourselves and your donors you care about.

@TimSheehyMT Timmy
You and the rest of the #RacistRepublicans want to make it harder for women to vote.

You know your policies suck.

Voter fraud is almost non existent. https://t.co/UcPhWmTr1h
@TimSheehyMT Defend this Sheehy! Also stop gaslighting people on the Save Act. https://t.co/szf8o0OVc7
@TimSheehyMT Go talk to Sen Thune!! Then tell us the problem and why it's not happening and what YOU as our Senator is doing about it
